detail_desc: Shorts in stretch jersey with a denim look made from a cotton blend. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Fitted top in sturdy, stretch jersey with a square neckline. Long puff sleeves that are close-fitting at the cuffs and have gathers and pleats for added volume.

Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides, a decorative tab and buckle, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Woven fabric lining.
Blouse in a patterned weave with buttons all the way down the back, long sleeves and elasticated cuffs with ties.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and contrasting colour trims.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch satin made from a cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleats at the top for added volume, a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication, and a double-layered skirt with an asymmetric top layer. Lined.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.

Oversized shirt jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal welt front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Basketball-inspired shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a concealed zip.
Large metal earrings. Size approx. 7 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with front pockets and straps that cross and have adjustable fasteners at the back.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and soft inside.
Dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked waist with decorative bows at the sides. Jersey lining.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.

Small backpack in grained, imitation leather with a handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one large compartment and one zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size approx. 9x18x20 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 60 cm, circumference 180 cm.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
Short, boxy jumper with cable-knit sections, a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in airy chiffon with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and 3/4-length puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and smocked cuffs with a frill trim.
Weekend bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top, and studs on the bottom. Two inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 22x31x48 cm.

Long shirt in a striped cotton weave with a collar, V-neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke with an overlap pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with broderie anglaise. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Frilled seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a flared skirt. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.

Set with a T-shirt in jersey and pair of shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline and visible seams around the sleeves and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and a back pocket.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Pyjama bottoms in fleece with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a V-neck, low-cut back and gently rounded hem.
Scarf in a soft loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with a tab and press-stud fastening, four large inner compartments and three smaller inner compartments. Height 6.5 cm. Width 10 cm.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit with a fleece lining.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft mohair-blend knit with a turtleneck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine, striped knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with a kangaroo pocket and appliqués on the front, and press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals with an imitation leather toe strap, narrow, adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.

Wide tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam and flared peplum at the hem with a pleat at the front.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. One pair of longer and one pair of shorter handles. Unlined. Depth 20 cm. Height 32.5 cm. Width 58 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fitted vest top in soft stretch jersey.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine knit with fringing. No fasteners.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in organic cotton jersey with a collar, short puff sleeves with scalloped edges, buttons at the neck and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length, double-layered coat in a felted wool blend with a large, detachable shawl. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Visible seam at the front, discreet side pockets and slits in the sides. Large loop at the back of the neck through which to attach the shawl. Unlined. The wool content of the coat is recycled. The polyester content of the coat is partly recycled.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a high V-neck and long sleeves.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Set with braces and a bow tie. Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied, patterned bow tie with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Leather ankle boots with a zip in one side and loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Top in printed, appliquéd sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
